definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!

sentences.english: Drop your crybaby stuff and drive that deal through with Pak.
sentences.chinese: 让那些无能的人滚蛋吧，好好面对与巴基斯坦的问题。

sentences.english: I am glad to see Flavio busted, I make no bones about that.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴看到弗拉维奥滚蛋，虽然我一分钱拿不到。

sentences.english: Harry used the threat of magic spells to get rid of the sniffy Dudley Dursley.
sentences.chinese: 哈利假装要使用魔咒，叫不识趣的达力滚蛋。

sentences.english: A few Saturdays ago, he came with snacks and a plastic bag stuffed with hard-boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 数星期前，他带了一些零食和一袋石滚蛋。

definition: to pack and quit/to be sacked
Shut up!/same as 閉上嘴巴|闭上嘴巴
(coll.) to beat it/to take French leave
my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
to make oneself scarce/to slip away/to take French leave
pinyin: pai1 pai1 pi4 gu5 zou3 ren2

definition: see 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1]
to boil (of liquid)/boiling hot/Get out!/Go away!/fuck off (rude)
(coll.) to quit one's job in disgust
